stories.title: Social Sharing & Meta Tags
stories.description: Add og:image/og:title/og:description to index.html, create 1200x630 social image (dark bg with vibe logo and cyan glow), add Copy Result button (copies 'The vibes chose: [winner]! vibe.vibevalidator.com'), add Share button with navigator.share() (fallback to copy on desktop), add favicon
stories.verify: Share link shows preview, Copy button works

stories.title: Loading State & First Impression
stories.description: Loading skeleton with pulsing placeholder and 'Loading vibes...' text while Three.js initializes, error boundary for 3D failures showing 'Oops! Refresh to try again', first-time user hints in InputPanel ('Try: Pizza, Burgers, Tacos'), quick-add example buttons, subtle entrance animation when ready
stories.verify: Throttle to 3G shows loading. First visit shows examples.

stories.title: Input Validation & Messaging
stories.description: Duplicate detection (case-insensitive) with inline 'Already added!' error and shake animation, max capacity message at 12 options (disable input, show 'Maximum reached'), smart disabled button text: 0 options='Add at least 2 options', 1 option='Add 1 more option', spinning='Deciding...', empty input shake on Enter
stories.verify: Try adding duplicate shows shake error, try adding 13th option blocked

stories.title: Sound Effects
stories.description: Create useSound hook using Web Audio API (no external deps), add speaker toggle button in top-right corner (store preference in localStorage, default on), play sounds: soft pop on option add, rapid ticks during shuffle (every card flip), pleasant chime on winner reveal
stories.verify: Toggle sound works, hear pop/tick/chime at appropriate moments

stories.title: Haptic Feedback & Mobile Polish
stories.description: Create useHaptics hook using navigator.vibrate(), add drag handle to mobile bottom sheet (40px wide, 4px tall centered pill), swipe-to-delete option chips (swipe left reveals red delete, haptic on delete), haptic patterns: add option=15ms, shuffle start=40ms, winner reveal=[100,50,100], delete=40ms
stories.verify: Swipe to delete works on mobile, vibrations feel premium

stories.title: Micro-interactions & Accessibility
stories.description: Better option removal animation (shrink+rotate+fade: exit={{ opacity:0, scale:0.3, y:-20, rotate:10 }}), Undo toast on 'New Vibes' showing 'Options cleared' with Undo button (3s timeout), keyboard shortcuts (Escape=clear with confirmation, Delete=remove focused option), increase winner particles to 80, ARIA labels on all buttons, respect prefers-reduced-motion in Framer, aria-live region to announce winner for screen readers
stories.verify: Keyboard shortcuts work, Undo works, accessible with screen reader
